title: NETHOUSE ORB / fireplace phasmid
description: You think the fire iron is a phasmid.

dialogueTree.title: Inland Empire: "Is that the phasmid? It looks like..."
dialogueTree.english: Is that the phasmid? It looks like the phasmid, leaning against the wall...
dialogueTree.polish: Czy to straszyk? Zdaje się że tak, opiera się o ścianę...
dialogueTree.belarusian: Ці гэта палохаўка? Здаецца, што так, абапіраецца на сцяну...

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Wait, what if this is the fishing r..."
links.english: Wait, what if this is the fishing rod situation all over again?
links.polish: Zaraz, a jeśli to taka sama sytuacja jak z tamtą wędką?
links.belarusian: Пачакай, а калі гэта такая ж сітуацыя, як з той вудай?

links.title: You: "Try to sneak up to the phasmid."
links.english: Try to sneak up to the phasmid.

links.title: Inland Empire: "It's not the phasmid... It's not ev..."
links.english: It's not the phasmid... It's not even organic -- it's a fire iron. How disappointing!
links.polish: To nie straszyk... To nawet nie substancja organiczna, a zwykły pogrzebacz. Co za rozczarowanie!
links.belarusian: Гэта не страхаванне... Гэта нават не арганічная рэчыва, а звычайны пакаленік. Якое расчараванне!

links.title: Inland Empire: "Right?! You'll have better luck nex..."
links.english: Right?! You'll have better luck next time, though. The phasmid -- finding it is your destiny.
links.polish: No nie? Ale następnym razem ci się bardziej poszczęści. Znalezienie tego straszyka to twoje przeznaczenie.
links.belarusian: Ну не? Але наступным разам табе больш пашанцуе. Знайсці гэтага страхулі - гэта тваё прызначэнне.

links.title: You: "Give the dream of discovering the I..."
links.english: Give the dream of discovering the Insulindian phasmid a rest... for now. [Leave.]
links.polish: Zapomnij o odkryciu tego insulindiańskiego straszyka. Na jakiś czas. [Odejdź].
links.belarusian: Забудзь пра адкрыццё гэтага інсуліндыйскага палачаніка. На нейкі час. [Адыдзі].

links.title: You: "Of course that wasn't the phasmid...."
links.english: Of course that wasn't the phasmid. It's way too big.
links.polish: Oczywiście, że to nie był straszyk. Jest za duży.
links.belarusian: Вядома, што гэта не быў страшык. Ён занадта вялікі.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Don't be too hard on yourself. You..."
links.english: Don't be too hard on yourself. You couldn't have known that for sure. And, besides, finding this phasmid is your special destiny -- you can feel it!
links.polish: Nie bądź dla siebie zbyt surowy. Nie mogłeś wiedzieć tego na pewno. Poza tym znalezienie tego straszyka to twoje wyjątkowe przeznaczenie. Czujesz to!
links.belarusian: Не будзь да сябе занадта строгі. Ты не мог ведаць гэтага напэўна. Акрамя таго, знаходжанне гэтага паласатога жука — гэта твой унікальны лёс. Ты адчуваеш гэта!

links.title: You: "This is what I get for trying to be..."
links.english: This is what I get for trying to be a scientist instead of a cop. I mean, I'm not even a *good* cop.
links.polish: Oto jak się kończy zabawa policjanta w naukowca. A przecież *nawet gliną* nie jestem za dobrym.
links.belarusian: Вось як заканчваецца гульня паліцэйскага ў навукоўца. А між тым *нават паліцэйскім* я не з'яўляюся добрым.

links.title: Inland Empire: "You were just following your instin..."
links.english: You were just following your instincts, your destiny. You're meant to find the phasmid! Just maybe not here...
links.polish: Słuchałeś tylko swojego instynktu, przeznaczenia. Jest ci pisane znaleźć tego straszyka! Tylko może nie tutaj...
links.belarusian: Ты слухаў толькі свой інстынкт, свой лёс. Табе наканавана знайсці гэтага страшыдла! Толькі, магчыма, не тут...

links.title: You: "Leap toward the phasmid and clasp i..."
links.english: Leap toward the phasmid and clasp it in your hands!
links.polish: Rzuć się na straszyka i chwyć go mocno w ręce!
links.belarusian: Кінься на страшыка і моцна схапі яго ў рукі!

links.title: You: "You're not going to be fooled again..."
links.english: You're not going to be fooled again. You're going to stand here calmly and observe this non-phasmid until you see what it really is...
links.polish: Nie dasz się znowu nabrać. Będziesz stał tu spokojnie i obserwował tego niestraszyka, dopóki nie zobaczysz jasno, czym właściwie jest...
links.belarusian: Ты не дазволіш сябе зноў падмануць. Будзеш стаяць тут спакойна і назіраць за гэтым незнаёмцам, пакуль не ўбачыш ясна, што ён на самай справе...

links.title: Inland Empire: "Fine. It's not a phasmid. It's not..."
links.english: Fine. It's not a phasmid. It's not even organic. Just a fire iron resting by the fire place. But... where's your sense of wonder, man?
links.polish: No dobra, to nie straszyk. To nawet nie substancja organiczna, a zwykły pogrzebacz przy kominku. Ale... gdzie twoja wiara w nieznane, chłopie?
links.belarusian: Ну добра, дык гэта не жахліўка. Гэта нават не арганічная рэчыва, а звычайная качарга ля каміна. Але... дзе твая вера ў невядомае, хлопча?

links.title: You: "Forget about the phasmid... err, fi..."
links.english: Forget about the phasmid... err, fire iron. [Leave.]
links.polish: Dość już o tym straszyku. Znaczy... o pogrzebaczu. [Odejdź].
links.belarusian: Досыць ужо пра гэтага пужальніка. Значыць... пра качаргу. [Адыдзі].
